name: Aero Wing
effect: "Effects: Add Special Ability ""Fly."" Add an additional Special Ability ""Fight"" when your Digimon Group is Dragon Digimon."

name: Armor Duplication
effect: Effects: Use this card to Armor Digivolve to a Digimon requiring any Digi-Egg. Place this card face down on the Power Port when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Battle Tomahawk
effect: "Effects: Add 100 points to your Digimon Power when your Digimon has Special Ability ""Fight."""

name: Big Bang Hammer
effect: "Effects: Add 100 points to your Digimon Power when your Digimon has the Special Ability ""Fight""."

name: Blitz
effect: Effect: If you lose the Duel, send opponent's top three Online cards Offline.

name: Counter Attack!
effect: Effect: When confronting an opponent of a higher Digivolve Level, double the number of your Digimon Power until end of Duel.

name: D-Power Digivice Green/Yellow
effect: Effects: Use this card when required to Digivolve to an Ultimate or Mega with Battle Type Green or Yellow. Place this card face down on the Power Port, when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: D-Power Digivice Red
effect: Effects: Use this card when required to Digivolve to an Ultimate or Mega with Battle Type Red. Place this card face down on the Power Port, when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: D-Power Digivice Red/Green
effect: Effects: Use this card when required to Digivolve to an Ultimate or Mega with Battle Type Red or Green. Place this card face down on the Power Port, when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: D-Power Digivice Yellow
effect: Effects: Use this card when required to Digivolve to an Ultimate or Mega with Battle Type Yellow. Place this card face down on the Power Port, when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Dark Network
effect: Effects: You may take 1 card from your opponent's hand and send it to their Offline area. Do not look at the card when sending it Offline.

name: Deffensive C
effect: Effects: Change your Digimon Power to Yellow and add 100 points to your Yellow Digimon Power. This doesn't change your Battle Type.

name: Digi-Duel
effect: Effect: If you win the Duel, double your Score. To use this card, send three of your Online cards Offline.

name: Digidote
effect: Effects: When your Digimon type is Vaccine and confronting an opponent of digimon type Virus, change your opponent's Digimon Power to the lowest Digimon Power until end of Duel.

name: Digivice Data&Virus
effect: Effects: Use this card when required to Digivolve to an Ultimate or Mega with Digimon Type Data or Virus. Place this card face down on Power Port when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Digivice Green & Yellow
effect: Effect: Use this card when required to Digivolve to an Ultimate or Mega with Battle Type [GREEN] or [YELLOW]. Place this card face down on Power Port when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Digivice Red
effect: Effect: Use this card when required to Digivolve to an Ultimate or Mega with Battle Type [RED]. Place this card face down on Power Port when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Digivice Red & Green
effect: Effect: Use this card when required to Digivolve to an Ultimate or Mega with Battle Type [RED] or [GREEN]. Place this card face down on Power Port when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Digivice Vaccine
effect: Effects: Use this card when required to Digivolve to an Ultimate or Mega with Digimon Type Vaccine. Place this card face down on Power Port when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Digivice Vaccine&Data
effect: Effects: Use this card when required to Digivolve to an Ultimate or Mega with Digimon Type Vaccine or Data. Place this card face down on Power Port when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Digivice Virus
effect: Effects: Use this card when required to Digivolve to an Ultimate or Mega with Digimon Type Virus. Place this card face down on Power Port when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Digivice Yellow
effect: Effect: Use this card when required to Digivolve to an Ultimate or Mega with Battle Type [YELLOW]. Place this card face down on Power Port when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Digivolution E
effect: Effects: Digivolve any Rookie Digimon to Champion level, reguardless of Digivolve Requirements. Place this card face down on Power Port and place next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Downgrade
effect: Effect: Downgrade either your Champion or your opponent's Champion to Rookie. Place this card on Power Port and send either your Champion or your opponent's Champion Offline. To use this card, send one card from your hand Offline.

name: Effect P
effect: Effects: Send an opponent's Power Option card Offline.

name: Evil Chip
effect: Effects: Add 200 points to your Digimon Power when your Digimon type is Virus.

name: Grapple Chip
effect: "Effects: Double your score when your Digimon with Special Ability ""Fight"" wins the Duel."

name: Green Offensive
effect: Effect: Change your Digimon Power to [GREEN]. This does not chang your Battle Type.

name: Green Power Bean
effect: Effects: When your opponent's Battle Type is Green, add an additional 50 points to your Digimon Power. You may also take 1 card from your opponent's hand and send it to their Offline area. Do not look at the card when sending it Offline.

name: HerculesKabuterimon
effect: Red:300 (Defend) Green:470 (Mega Electro Shocker) Yellow:510 (Giga Scissor Claw)

name: Kokuwamon
effect: Red:350 (Mini Scissor Claws) Green:260 (Mini Electro Shocker) Yellow:150 (Defend)

name: Max Charger
effect: Effects: Double your Digimon Power when your Digimon is Mega Level.

name: Metal Armor
effect: Effects: Use this card to Armor Digivolve to a Digimon requiring any Digi-Egg. Place this card face down on the Power Port when placing next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Metal Attack
effect: Effect: Add 50 points to your Digimon Power. To use this card, send one card from your hand Offline.

name: MetalGarurumon
effect: Red:550 (Metal Wolf Claw) Green:530 (Metal Slamming Attack) Yellow:280 (Defend)

name: NiseDrimogemon
effect: Red:400 (Bogus Iron Drill Spin) Green:380 (Fake Mole's Claw) Yellow:160 (Defend)

name: Offensive B
effect: Effects: Change your Digimon Power to Green and add 100 points to your Green Digimon Power. This doesn't change your Battle Type.

name: Offensive F
effect: Effects: Void an opponent's Field Card effect.

name: Offensive H
effect: Effects: Change your Green Digimon Power to the same points as Red Digimon Power. This Doesn't change your Battle Type.

name: Offensive W
effect: Effects: Add 50 points to your Digimon Power. When your Digimon has Special Effect to add Digimon Power, Change that point to 100 points.

name: Okuwamon
effect: Red:290 (Defend) Green:380 (Beetle Horn Attack) Yellow:400 (Double Scissor Claws)

name: Power-Up Floppy Disk
effect: Effects: Draw 1 card from your Online deck. If the card is a Digimon card, move it to Offline then double the Digimon Power of your card currently on Duel Zone. If the card is a Power Option card there is no effect.

name: Red Offensive
effect: Effect: Change your Digimon Power to [RED]. This does not chang your Battle Type.

name: Red Power Bean
effect: Effects: When your opponent's Battle Type is Red, add an additional 50 points to your Digimon Power. You may also take 1 card from your opponent's hand and send it to their Offline area. Do not look at the card when sending it Offline.

name: Resist Downgrade
effect: Effects: Play when Online Deck is exhausted. Your Digimon may remain at its current Digimon level without downgrading to Rookie. To use this card send 10 cards Offline from the replenished Online deck.

name: Secret Crush
effect: Effects: You may exchange any 1 card from your hand for the top card of your Online deck.

name: Shining Digivolution
effect: Effects: Digivolve any Digimon to the next level, reguardless of Digivolve Requirements. Place this card face down on Power Port and place next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Super Charger
effect: Effects: Add 200 points to your Digimon Power when your Digimon is Ultimate.

name: Terra Firma
effect: "Effects: Add 100 points to your Digimon Power when your Digimon has the Special Ability ""Dig""."

name: To Champion
effect: Effect: Downgrade your Ultimate or Mega to Champion. Place this card face down on Power Port and place Champion from your hand face down on Digivolve Zone.

name: Ultra Digivolve
effect: Effect: Digivolve any Digimon to next Level, regardless of Digivolve Requirements. Place this card face down on Power Port and place next-level Digimon face down on Digivolve Zone. To use this card, send the rest of your hand Offline.

name: Yellow Offensive
effect: Effect: Change your Digimon Power to [YELLOW]. This does not chang your Battle Type.

name: Yellow Power Bean
effect: Effects: When your opponent's Battle Type is Yellow, add an additional 50 points to your Digimon Power. You may also take 1 card from your opponent's hand and send it to their Offline area. Do not look at the card when sending it Offline.
